replies.author: 九耀龙翔
replies.txt_content:
Lycanites Mobs https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/lycanites-mobs
恐怖生物，加了一堆怪
Grimoire of Gaia https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/grimoire-of-gaia
盖亚魔典
Rough Mobs Revamped https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/rough-mobs-revamped
怪物重生
Ice and Fire https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/ice-and-fire-dragons
冰火传说
The Betweenlands https://www.curseforge.com/minec ... he-betweenlands-mod
交错纬度
AbyssalCraft https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/abyssalcraft
深渊国度
The Erebus https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/the-erebus
混沌之地

replies.author: Twilight_Two
replies.txt_content: 你可以试试用npc模组做出自己想要的怪物。属性啥的都方便自定义，模型，大小什么的也很方便调整。另外启示录模组加了过后，难度等级够高所有怪物的生命值和攻击力都会变得超高超变态，也可以看看
